mapper.select: select * from GCGL_ABGC where sbyf=#{sbyf} and jhid=#{jhid}
select count(*) from GCGL_ABGC where sbyf=#{sbyf} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update GCGL_ABGC set wc_btz=#{wc_btz},wc_stz=#{wc_stz},wc_qttz=#{wc_qttz},zjdw_btz=#{zjdw_btz},zjdw_stz=#{zjdw_stz},zjdw_qttz=#{zjdw_qttz},bywc_c=#{bywc_c},bywc_gl=#{bywc_gl},kgdl=#{kgdl},qksm=#{qksm},sbyf=#{sbyf} where id=#{id} and jhid=#{jhid}
update GCGL_ABGC set sfsj=#{sfsj} where id=#{id}
update GCGL_ABGC set shuser=#{shuser},shtime=#{shtime},zjje=#{zjje},xgcsyj=#{xgcsyj},cscyj=#{cscyj},shzt='已审核' where id=#{id} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select * from GCGL_CGS where tbyf=#{tbyf} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update GCGL_CGS set cgsdwzj=#{cgsdwzj},tbyf=#{tbyf} where id=#{id} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select ${tiaojian} tiaojian,${lxmc} sgxkwjfile from PLAN_ABGC where SCKID=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update PLAN_ABGC set WJGYY=#{wjgyy} where SCKID=#{jhid}
update PLAN_ABGC set SJWGSJ=#{sjwgsj},JGZT=#{jgzt} where SCKID=#{jhid}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.jhnf sbnf,t1.jhkgsj,t1.jhwgsj,t1.sjdw,t1.sjpfdw,t1.pfwh,t1.pfsj,t1.pfztz,t1.JHSYBBZJE jhsybzje,t1.JHSYDFZCZJ jhsydfzcje,t1.sfsqablbz,t1.ablbzsqwh,t1.gkbglj,t1.gkbgmc,t1.sjsgtlj,t1.sjsgtmc,t1.REMARKS jhbz,t1.xdsj,t1.sjkgsj,t1.SCKID jhid,t1.id, t1.yjwgsj yjjgsj,t1.sgdw,t1.jldw,t1.jsdw,t1.gys,t1.htje,t1.sjwgsj,t1.kgzt,t1.jgzt,t1.wjgyy,t1.sgxkwj,t1.jgtcwj,t1.jgyswj, t3.gydw,t3.xzqhdm,t3.xzqhmc,t3.lxjsdj,t3.lxbm,t3.lxmc,t3.qdzh,t3.zdzh,t3.qzlc,t3.yhlc,t3.gjxjnd,t3.yhnr,t3.xmnf,t3.xmtype,t3.bz,t3.tsdq, t2.tzgs,t2.spwh,t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.scbz from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
order by t1.jhnf ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1 and spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
select sgxkwj,jgtcwj,jgyswj from PLAN_ABGC where SCKID=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update PLAN_ABGC set sjzt=#{sjzt} where sckid=#{jhid}
update PLAN_ABGC set xjzt=#{xjzt} where sckid=#{jhid}
update PLAN_ABGC set sjsh=#{sjsh} where sckid=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from GCGL_ABGC where jhid=#{jhid} and sfsj=#{yhtype} and shzt='未审核'

select t1.sckid v_0,t3.gydw v_1,t3.xzqhmc v_2,t3.lxbm v_3,t3.lxmc v_4,t3.qdzh v_5,t3.zdzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
order by t1.jhnf

select t2.id v_0, t2.sbnf v_2,t2.jhkgsj v_3,t2.jhwgsj v_4,t2.xmmc v_1,t2.lmkd,t2.sftqss,t2.sjdw,t2.yhlb,t2.dc,t2.jc,t2.mc,t2.sjpfdw,t2.pfwh,t2.pfsj,t2.pfztz v_5,t2.jhsybzje v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_GCGJ t2 where 1=1 and t2.id in(${tiaojian})

select distinct(t2.id) id from PLAN_LX_GCGJ t1 left join PLAN_GCGJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'

select t2.id v_0,t1.gydw v_1,t1.xzqhmc v_2,t1.lxbm v_3,t1.lxmc v_4,t1.qdzh v_5,t1.zdzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_LX_GCSJ t1 left join PLAN_GCSJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'

select id v_0,xzqhmc v_1,jhnf v_2,xmmc v_3,jsxz v_4,kgn v_5,wgn v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_HSLY where 1=1
and xzqhdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and xmmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'

select t2.id v_0,t1.gydw v_1,t1.xzqhmc v_2,t1.lxbm v_3,t1.lxmc v_4,t1.qdzh v_5,t1.zdzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'

select t2.id v_0,t1.gydwmc v_1,t1.xzqhmc v_2,t1.lxbm v_3,t1.lxmc v_4,t1.qdzh v_5,t1.zdzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_LX_YHDZX t1 left join PLAN_YHDZX t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'

select t1.sckid v_0,t3.gydw v_1,t3.xzqhmc v_2,t3.lxbm v_3,t3.lxmc v_4,t3.qdzh v_5,t3.zdzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_ZHFZ t1 left join SCK_ZHFZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ZHFZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'

select t1.sckid v_0,t3.gydw v_1,t3.xzqhmc v_2,t3.qlbh v_3,t3.qlmc v_4,t3.jsdj v_5,t3.qlzxzh v_6,#{tbyf} v_8,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') v_9,#{tbr} v_10 from PLAN_WQGZ t1 left join SCK_WQGZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_WQGZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.qlmc like '%'||trim(#{tiaojian})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.sckid v_0,t3.gydw v_1,t3.xzqhmc v_2,t3.lxbm v_3,t3.lxmc v_4,t3.qdzh v_5,t3.zdzh v_6,t3.qzlc v_7,t3.yhlc v_8,t3.gjxjnd v_9,t1.id v_10 from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.spzt='1'
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
)m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select t1.jhnf sbnf,t1.jhkgsj,t1.jhwgsj,t1.sjdw,t1.sjpfdw,t1.pfwh,t1.pfsj,t1.pfztz,t1.JHSYBBZJE jhsybzje,t1.JHSYDFZCZJ jhsydfzcje,t1.sfsqablbz,t1.ablbzsqwh,t1.gkbglj,t1.gkbgmc,t1.sjsgtlj,t1.sjsgtmc,t1.REMARKS jhbz,t1.xdsj,t1.sjkgsj,t1.SCKID jhid,t1.id, t1.yjwgsj yjjgsj,t1.sgdw,t1.jldw,t1.jsdw,t1.gys,t1.htje,t1.sjwgsj,t1.kgzt,t1.jgzt,t1.wjgyy,t1.sgxkwj,t1.jgtcwj,t1.jgyswj, t3.gydw,t3.xzqhdm,t3.xzqhmc,t3.lxjsdj,t3.lxbm,t3.lxmc,t3.qdzh,t3.zdzh,t3.qzlc,t3.yhlc,t3.gjxjnd,t3.yhnr,t3.xmnf,t3.xmtype,t3.bz,t3.tsdq, t2.tzgs,t2.spwh,t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.scbz from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where t1.sckid=#{jhid}
